getTotalTerminatedEmployees.query: select count(*) as rowcount from employee where emp_status='0'

insertEmployee.query: insert into employee (eid ,account_number, role ,gender ,on_project ,hiring_date ,contact_number  , ifsc_code, photo ,termination_date  , work_mail, dob , personal_mail , emp_status , branch_name, name, bank_name, role_status, aadhaar )values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) returning *

updateToken.query: update userdata set reset_password_token = ?,insertionTime = now() where user_name = ?

getToken.query: SELECT user_name, reset_password_token FROM userdata WHERE reset_password_token = ?

updatePassword.query: update userdata set password = crypt(?, gen_salt('bf',10)),reset_password_token = ? where user_name = ?

getActiveInactiveProjects.query: select prj_name from project_list where prj_status= ?;

getTotalRAD.query: select count(*) as rowcount from employee where department = ?

getActiveInactiveRAD.query: select * from employee where role = ? and emp_status = ?

insertSalary.query: insert into salary (eid, sal_date, name, role_status, salary) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

getTotalSalary.query: SELECT sum(salary) FROM salary WHERE sal_date between ? AND ?

getTotalExpenses.query: SELECT sum(amount)from miscellaneous WHERE sal_date between ? AND ?

getTotalAmount.query: SELECT sum(prj_income) FROM income WHERE prj_income_month BETWEEN ? and ?

updateEmployee.query: update employee set eid = ? ,account_number = ?, role = ?,  aadhaar = ?, gender = ?, on_project = ?,hiring_date = ?,contact_number  = ? ,role_status = ? , ifsc_code = ? , photo = ? ,termination_date = ? , work_mail = ? , dob = ?, personal_mail = ?, emp_status = ?, branch_name = ? , name = ?, bank_name = ?  where eid = ? returning *

updateClients.query: update client_details set client_name = ? where client_id = ?

insertProject.query: insert into project_list(prj_id ,end_date, prj_name, prj_status, client_id ,start_date )values(?,?,?,?,?,?);

updateProject.query: update project_list set end_date = ?, prj_name = ?,  prj_status = ?, start_date = ? where prj_id= ? and client_id = ?

getRADDetails.query: SELECT emp_id,display_id,role_status,photo,name,role,on_project,hiring_date,department,salary,emp_status from employee where  emp_status =? and department = ?

searchRADDetails.query: SELECT emp_id,display_id,role_status,photo,name,role,on_project,hiring_date,department,salary,emp_status from employee where department = ? order by created_date desc

getRADInternCount.query: SELECT role,COUNT(*)  FROM employee where department='RAD' GROUP BY role

getDetails.query: select display_id from employee where role =?

insertRAD.query: insert into employee(emp_id, account_number, role ,gender ,display_id, l_name,hiring_date , termination_date, emp_status,branch_name, bank_name, department, on_project,photo, contact_number  , ifsc_code, dob, aadhaar_number, personal_mail , f_name, name, work_mail,  role_status, id_proof_photo,  resume,id_proof,  dept_id ,status) values(nextval('emp_id'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,public.encrypt(bytea(?),bytea('gen_salt'),text('aes')),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)ON CONFLICT (emp_id) DO UPDATE SET dept_id = EXCLUDED.dept_id,display_id= EXCLUDED.display_id,f_name= EXCLUDED.f_name,l_name= EXCLUDED.l_name,name= EXCLUDED.name,photo= EXCLUDED.photo ,resume= EXCLUDED.resume,id_proof = EXCLUDED.id_proof,aadhaar_number= EXCLUDED.aadhaar_number,role= EXCLUDED.role ,role_status= EXCLUDED.role_status ,account_number= EXCLUDED.account_number ,ifsc_code = EXCLUDED.ifsc_code,bank_name = EXCLUDED.bank_name ,branch_name= EXCLUDED.branch_name ,work_mail= EXCLUDED.work_mail,personal_mail= EXCLUDED.personal_mail,contact_number = EXCLUDED.contact_number,dob= EXCLUDED.dob,on_project= EXCLUDED.on_project,hiring_date= EXCLUDED.hiring_date,termination_date= EXCLUDED.termination_date,gender= EXCLUDED.gender,emp_status= EXCLUDED.emp_status,status = EXCLUDED.status,department= EXCLUDED.department

insertEmpRAD.query: insert into employee( account_number, role ,gender ,display_id, l_name,hiring_date , termination_date, emp_status,branch_name, bank_name, department,emp_id, on_project, photo, contact_number  , ifsc_code, dob, aadhaar_number, personal_mail , f_name, name, work_mail,  role_status, id_proof_photo,  resume,id_proof,  dept_id ,status) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,public.encrypt(bytea(?),bytea('gen_salt'),text('aes')),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)ON CONFLICT (emp_id) DO UPDATE SET dept_id = EXCLUDED.dept_id,display_id= EXCLUDED.display_id,f_name= EXCLUDED.f_name,l_name= EXCLUDED.l_name,name= EXCLUDED.name,photo= EXCLUDED.photo ,resume= EXCLUDED.resume,id_proof = EXCLUDED.id_proof,aadhaar_number= EXCLUDED.aadhaar_number,role= EXCLUDED.role ,role_status= EXCLUDED.role_status ,account_number= EXCLUDED.account_number ,ifsc_code = EXCLUDED.ifsc_code,bank_name = EXCLUDED.bank_name ,branch_name= EXCLUDED.branch_name ,work_mail= EXCLUDED.work_mail,personal_mail= EXCLUDED.personal_mail,contact_number = EXCLUDED.contact_number,dob= EXCLUDED.dob,on_project= EXCLUDED.on_project,hiring_date= EXCLUDED.hiring_date,termination_date= EXCLUDED.termination_date,gender= EXCLUDED.gender,emp_status= EXCLUDED.emp_status,status = EXCLUDED.status,department= EXCLUDED.department

insertWorkEmpRAD.query: insert into employee( account_number, role ,gender ,display_id, l_name,hiring_date , termination_date, emp_status,branch_name, bank_name, department,emp_id, on_project, photo, contact_number  , ifsc_code, dob, aadhaar_number, personal_mail , f_name, name,  role_status, id_proof_photo,  resume,id_proof,  dept_id ,status) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,public.encrypt(bytea(?),bytea('gen_salt'),text('aes')),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)ON CONFLICT (emp_id) DO UPDATE SET dept_id = EXCLUDED.dept_id,display_id= EXCLUDED.display_id,f_name= EXCLUDED.f_name,l_name= EXCLUDED.l_name,name= EXCLUDED.name,photo= EXCLUDED.photo ,resume= EXCLUDED.resume,id_proof = EXCLUDED.id_proof,aadhaar_number= EXCLUDED.aadhaar_number,role= EXCLUDED.role ,role_status= EXCLUDED.role_status ,account_number= EXCLUDED.account_number ,ifsc_code = EXCLUDED.ifsc_code,bank_name = EXCLUDED.bank_name ,branch_name= EXCLUDED.branch_name ,personal_mail= EXCLUDED.personal_mail,contact_number = EXCLUDED.contact_number,dob= EXCLUDED.dob,on_project= EXCLUDED.on_project,hiring_date= EXCLUDED.hiring_date,termination_date= EXCLUDED.termination_date,gender= EXCLUDED.gender,emp_status= EXCLUDED.emp_status,status = EXCLUDED.status,department= EXCLUDED.department

getDepartmentDetails.query: select distinct (dept_id),dept_name from department where dept_status=1

getRoleList.query: select distinct role from role where department = ?

roleDescriptionList.query: select distinct role_status from role where   role= ? and department = ?

updateRAD.query: update employee set  account_number =?, role = ?,gender = ?,display_id = ?, l_name = ?, hiring_date =? ,branch_name = ?, bank_name = ?, department = ?,on_project = ?, photo = ?,contact_number= ?,  ifsc_code= ?, termination_date=?, dob = ?, aadhaar_number = public.encrypt(bytea(?),bytea('gen_salt'),text('aes')), personal_mail=?, f_name=?, name =?, work_mail=?, role_status = ?, id_proof_photo=?, resume=?, id_proof=?, dept_id= ? where emp_id = ?

updateRADWorkMail.query: update employee set  account_number =?, role = ?,gender = ?,display_id = ?, l_name = ?, hiring_date =? ,branch_name = ?, bank_name = ?, department = ?,on_project = ?, photo = ?,contact_number= ?,  ifsc_code= ?, termination_date=?, dob = ?, aadhaar_number = public.encrypt(bytea(?),bytea('gen_salt'),text('aes')),personal_mail=?, f_name=?, name =?,  role_status = ?, id_proof_photo=?, resume=?, id_proof=?, dept_id= ? where emp_id = ?

updateStatus.query: update employee set emp_status = ? where emp_id= ?

updateSalary.query: begin;insert into salary(emp_id,role_status,remark,salary,sal_date)values (?,?,?,?,current_date);update employee set salary=? where emp_id=?; update employee  set total_salary = sum_total from (select sum(salary)as sum_total from salary where emp_id=?)as salary   where emp_id =?;insert into miscellaneous_payment(mis_date,amount,mis_id,emp_id,mis_type)values(?,?,?,?,?);  commit

getUpdateSalary.query: begin;insert into salary(emp_id,role_status,remark,salary,sal_date)values (?,?,?,?,current_date);update employee set salary=? where emp_id=?; update employee  set total_salary = sum_total from (select sum(salary)as sum_total from salary where emp_id=?)as salary   where emp_id =?; commit;

getProjects.query: select prj_id,prj_name from project_list where prj_status= ?
